title: Global jurisprudence needs urgent evolution for emerging climate, tech phenomena: Jitendra Singh
description: Lucknow, Nov 22 (PTI) Union Minister of State for Science and Technology Jitendra Singh on Saturday said that judicial leadership and global jurisprudence must urgently evolve to address emerging challenges like those of the deep ocean, space debris, and artificial intelligence. The minister said there are four vital changes required, beginning with “strengthening international environmental […]
content:
Singh said international environmental law can no longer function in silos as countries today face “interconnected crises” ranging from climate change to ocean degradation.
He stressed the need for regulations to govern emerging technologies such as ... [4049 chars]

title: AI-driven innovations in pediatric ultrasound imaging and analysis
description: Announcing a new article publication for BIO Integration journal. The emerging application of artificial intelligence (AI) in pediatric ultrasound has shown significant potential to improve diagnostic accuracy and efficiency, particularly in addressing the challenges of conventional ultrasound in operator dependence, inconsistent image quality, and limited quantitative analysis capabilities.
content: Announcing a new article publication for BIO Integration journal. The emerging application of artificial intelligence (AI) in pediatric ultrasound has shown significant potential to improve diagnostic accuracy and efficiency, particularly in addressi... [1185 chars]

title: Google’s Gemini 3 unleashes a new era of AI search, build and think smarter
description: Google has launched Gemini 3, its most advanced artificial-intelligence model to date. Unlike previous model updates, Gemini 3 is embedded into Google Search from day one and available across multiple platforms. With benchmark-beating performance in reasoning, multimodal understanding and agentic coding, Google is signalling a pivot from pure research to revenue-driving AI applications. Gemini 3 brings, why it matters, and what the implications are for users, developers and the broader AI ecosystem.
content:
Synopsis

title: Top Biden adviser on AI and authoritarianism
description: Arati Prabhakar talks to Fast Company about what the rise of artificial intelligence will mean for the future of democracy.
content: Camps are finally emerging in the big fight over whether and how to regulate AI. President Donald Trump earlier this week declared that he would block local officials who try to regulate the technology; according to a draft executive order leaked on ... [11677 chars]

title: Benedict Cumberbatch says he feels "pretty depressed" about AI in the film industry and thinks we're "vanilla-fying" the "thing that makes us human"
description: The star of The Imitation Game chimes in on artificial intelligence
content: More of Hollywood’s finest are speaking up against the use of AI in the industry. Guillermo del Toro has assured that he’d rather die than use it, and now Benedict Cumberbatch has had a few words to say on the matter. During a Reddit AMA, the Doctor ... [1657 chars]

title: UAE cements global AI leadership with focus on human capital, training
description: The UAE is strengthening its leadership in Artificial Intelligence by investing in education, training, and research to build skilled national talent. Reports show the country leading the region in AI readiness and adoption, supported by major initiatives, universities, and government-backed programmes.
content: Abu Dhabi [UAE], November 22 (ANI/WAM): The United Arab Emirates is reinforcing its leading position in developing national expertise in Artificial Intelligence (AI) through strategic initiatives aimed at building human capital and preparing a genera... [3022 chars]

title: IEO Crypto Whale Launches Six Cutting-Edge Projects to Reshape the Web3 Landscape
description: As the global digital asset industry continues to evolve rapidly, IEO Crypto Whale has officially launched six of its internally incubated projects: YAMW, OSAK, SXPA, SAJS, MKAL and XSAW. These initiatives span across artificial intelligence, blockchain infrastructure, the metaverse, gaming, robotics and brain-computer interface (BCI) technologies marking a significant milestone in IEO Crypto Whale’s mission […]

title: Bernie Sanders Asks Whether AI Will Really Serve Workers Or 'What Mr Musk And Mr Bezos Have In Mind' As Geoffrey Hinton Reveals The Real Risk
description: Bernie Sanders and AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton warned that while artificial intelligence could greatly benefit society, its future depends on whether it's shaped for the public good or aligned with "what Mr. Musk and Mr. Bezos have in mind," as Washington moves to tighten federal control over the technology.
content: This week, in a wide-ranging discussion at Georgetown University, Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt) and AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton warned that artificial intelligence could improve lives — but only if it's controlled by people whose interests extend beyond ... [3300 chars]

title: Man referred to prosecutors for alleged copyright infringement of AI image
description: A 27-year-old man has been referred to prosecutors on suspicion of copying an image created by another person via specific prompts given to an artificial intelligence model, local police said. While he was not arrested, the case is likely the first of its kind to be sent to prosecutors over…
content:
